case.name: Chroma 3 Case
notes: Tier Weights Use Default CS Case Odds; Item Weights Are Evenly Distributed Within Each Tier With Deterministic Remainders.
Gold Pool Uses Phase-Level Doppler Outcomes (Phase 1-4, Ruby, Sapphire, Black Pearl) Plus Chroma Finishes (Damascus Steel, Marble Fade, Tiger Tooth, Rust Coat, Ultraviolet).
